title: Member Preview: Mel Bochner Drawings—A Retrospective
hero_caption: Mel Bochner. Five by Four, 1972/2022. Courtesy of the artist and Peter Freeman, Inc., Image © Mel Bochner.
short_description: Enjoy a full day of member-only access to Mel Bochner Drawings: A Retrospective and see the exhibition before it opens to the public.
list_description: Enjoy a full day of member-only access to Mel Bochner Drawings: A Retrospective and see the exhibition before it opens to the public.
description:
Enjoy a full day of member-only access to Mel Bochner Drawings: A Retrospective and see the exhibition before it opens to the public.

Over the course of a career that has spanned nearly six decades, Mel Bochner has been at the forefront of Conceptual Art, producing thought-provoking work in nearly every medium: drawing, painting, prints, photography, sculpture, books, and installations.

Simply show your member card or digital member card to enter.

See more member programs.

In accordance with state and City of Chicago guidelines, visitors to the museum are no longer required to wear masks or provide proof of vaccination. Anyone who would like to continue to wear a mask is welcome to do so. Learn more about our visiting policies and what to expect.
